name: Relics of Ehrran(Pre Gamer Slam)
description:
This description contains only the ideas, most of what is here is NOT implemented in this Prototype.

You play as Ehrran, an Artisan from old times that made countless magical objects called Relics, he hoped for creating one that would make him immortal, and he succeeded, but his newest creation, the Mask of Shadows, made him enter a long state of slumber. Ages later, he awakes in his temple, noticing that it has been raided and his Relics are mostly gone, now, he goes on a journey to find his creations, showing no mercy for those that stand in his way.

Game:

The game has a small map with a few enemies to kill.

Development notes:

Relics of Ehrran was made in under 4 months using Java.

This prototype was heavily difficult to program, mainly because we had to use Java as a requirement for the project, apart from that, we lost many of the files for character sprites mid-development and the animations became a lot more clunky.
